item.title: Season 4 Gameplay Guidelines (v1)
item.description: Please also read our Rules The goal of these guidelines is to be a list of good practices on the server. Although these are not enforced, I highly suggest reading through these to help make the WardenSMP experience as great as it can be! Don’t Kill Pets or Destroy People’s Builds Unless you want the person to take revenge, of course! Don’t kill pets or destroy people’s work if you don’t want to expect consequences from them!
item.content:
Please also read our Rules

The goal of these guidelines is to be a list of good practices on the server.

Although these are not enforced, I highly suggest reading through these to help make the WardenSMP experience as great as it can be!

  1. Don’t Kill Pets or Destroy People’s Builds

    1. Unless you want the person to take revenge, of course! Don’t kill pets or destroy people’s work if you don’t want to expect consequences from them!

  2. Take your time

    1. There is no reason to rush. Please don’t be the person who obtains maxed netherite gear within the first week! Bring the Long-Term into “Long-Term, Free-To-Play Survival”!
    2. Take your time and enjoy Minecraft for the sandbox game that it is! Whether it’s learning some redstone or starting a new building project, there is plenty to do before (and after) beating the Ender Dragon!

  3. Build your base near the spawn (or wherever everyone else is residing!)

    1. Although it’s tempting to explore and set up an isolated base far into the wild Minecraft world, consider the fact that you’re playing on a Survival Multiplayer Server. Why isolate yourself from the rest of the player base?
    2. Work together toward a common goal with the other members of the server. Whether it’s building a town or defeating a boss, make it a multiplayer effort!

  4. Don’t spam the chat

    1. Nobody wants their screen to be filled up with garbage. Try to keep the chat relevant to the gameplay of the server.
    2. Consider using the “/msg”, “/r”, or “/mail” commands for private messages on the server.

  5. Leave stuff for others (don’t pillage everything!)

    1. If you come across a rare structure or biome (village, bastion, mangrove forest, etc.), try to leave items for others. This allows slower-paced players to also get a chance to progress without having to venture out for thousands of blocks to find the same thing elsewhere.
    2. Of course, if there’s only one of something there, i.e., an armor trim, consider selling copies of it! This gives others a chance to buy it, and it gives you a chance to capitalize on your findings.

  6. Follow basic Minecraft server etiquette

    1. Don’t leave trees floating
    2. FILL IN creeper holes (from explosions)
    3. When mining dirt or sand, travel a bit of a distance from where players are building/living.
    4. Use common sense.

Contact _A13X with any questions, comments, or suggestions you may have.

Thank you for reading our gameplay guidelines! ðŸ˜„

item.title: Welcome to the WardenSMP website!
item.description: WardenSMP is a Minecraft Java survival server with plenty to do! We are starting our 4th season on June 16th, 8pm EST!, and plan to stick with vanilla minecraft survival! The website has been made pink to match with the new Cherry Grove biome in the 1.20 Trails & Tales Update! Please note that this is a closed sever, so only people that know the owner or have been invited by a member are permitted to join.
item.content:
WardenSMP is a Minecraft Java survival server with plenty to do! We are starting our 4th season on June 16th, 8pm EST!, and plan to stick with vanilla minecraft survival!
The website has been made pink to match with the new Cherry Grove biome in the 1.20 Trails & Tales Update!

Please note that this is a closed sever, so only people that know the owner or have been invited by a member are permitted to join.
To join, please contact _A13x. If you are a member, ask _A13X to add you to our Google Chat groups to receive announcements and to communicate.

Also check out our rules and guideliness!

If you’d like to take a look at our first season, you can check out the WardenSMP Season 1 Recap. Recaps for Seasons 2 and 3 are coming soon!

Feel free to contact _A13X with any questions, comments, or suggestions you may have.

  • Either personally,
  • Using alexbogo2007@protonmail.com,
  • Or in-game using “/mail send _A13X (your message)”.

item.title: Season 4 Rules (v1)
item.description: Please also read our Gameplay Guidelines The goal of these rules is to ensure everybody on this server is able to have a great experience. Obviously, the best judgement will be used when enforcing these rules. If you need to report something, contact _A13X. No Cheating (Hacking/X-Ray) Do not use clients, mods, or packs that give you an unfair advantage. Absolutely no lag machines or exploits in an attempt to crash or worsen the server’s performance.
item.content:
Please also read our Gameplay Guidelines

The goal of these rules is to ensure everybody on this server is able to have a great experience.

Obviously, the best judgement will be used when enforcing these rules. If you need to report something, contact _A13X.

  1. No Cheating (Hacking/X-Ray)

    1. Do not use clients, mods, or packs that give you an unfair advantage.
    2. Absolutely no lag machines or exploits in an attempt to crash or worsen the server’s performance.
    3. Please report if you suspect that somebody is hacking.

  2. Keep the server family-friendly

    1. Keep the chat family-friendly.
    2. No offensive remarks.
    3. Don’t build anything inappropriate.
    4. Don’t name items or mobs with inappropriate names.

  3. Respect others (No Stealing, Only Friendly Griefing)

    1. Do not continually target or bully somebody with the intent of upsetting them.
    2. Don’t take (steal) items or blocks of value from other players without their permission. This includes chests set up for things like public shops.
    3. Although Greifing and Killing are not explicitly disallowed, you must respect the time and effort that people have put into their work. Don’t go around the world placing random blocks or destroying landscapes (that others will inevitably have to clean up if they want to build on).
    4. If you plan to prank somebody, make sure it’s not too extreme. Try to prank only people that are on friendly terms with you, and make sure your pranks don’t disrupt anybody who doesn’t want to get involved.

  4. Contact _A13X if you need or want to suggest anything!

    • Either personally,
    • Using alexbogo2007@protonmail.com,
    • Or in-game using “/mail send _A13X (your message)”.

Thank you for reading our rules! ðŸ˜„
